duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for analyzing and evaluating operational performance metrics and resources.
Create and facilitate reporting and analysis to evaluate operational initiatives and drive operational efficiencies.
Provide analytical support of actual results against budget and feasibility of proposed business strategies.
Conduct regular audits to ensure data integrity and provide analysis of master and transactional data.
Consolidate data reports and deliver to help drive data-based strategic decision making.
Create and maintain compliance reports that identify discrepancies within the Company's billing systems.
Provide user feedback to management and help influence future systems enhancements.
Ensure accuracy of data through partnerships with team members.
Prepare reports to be used by other departments to correct billing issues.
Other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
Consistent exercise of independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
Regular, consistent and punctual attendance. Must be able to work nights and weekends, variable schedule(s) and overtime as necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Operations, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
